casebody.data:
Judy Click, JEC Healthcare Management, Inc., and Judken Click Holdings, LLC, Plaintiffs,
v.
John Leandro, Kathy Leandro, S&R Healthcare, Inc., and Raetuc Holdings, LLC, Defendants. No. COA15-913 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 15, 2016

AFFIRMED in part; REVERSED and REMANDED in part.
